title: The Siren's Call
description: The year is 2052. Global warming has changed the landscape of the planet. England - Bournemouth, in particular - is now one of the tourist capitals of the world. But, for Emilie Calvas, a normal fourteen year old girl living in the ever-growing city, it was a normal morning which would lead to a normal school day… or so she thought. All it took was one phone call before school started - one sentence, even. A revelation from someone that she’d never spoken to before, that would change her life forever. The myths were true. Mermaids were real. And she had twenty four hours to live. The Siren was calling her...
author: Glen Fletcher
